questions.question: What is meant by "Mode of Address?"

choices.answer: How a person speaks to an audience.
How a group of people speak to an audience.
How a text speaks to an audience.
How a newspaper speaks to an audience.

questions.question: Is this an example of high-key lighting?

choices.answer: Yes
No

questions.question: What effect does low-key lighting give in a camera shot?

choices.answer: Brightness/Clarity
Darkness/Dimness
Blurriness/Distortion
Mixture of light and dark

questions.question: What is meant by Star Power?

choices.answer: How many likes a star gets on social media.
How unpopular a star is.
How rich a star is.
How popular a star is.

questions.question: What is meant by Star Persona?

choices.answer: How a star is represented in the media.
What a star is like in real life
How a star is reported in the newspaper
A star's personal life.
How a product or person is "created" in the media.
How a product or person is reported on in the media.
How a product or person is promoted through advertising and design.
How much money a product or person in the media makes through advertising.
How a product/person creates a positive effect.
How two or more products/people work together to create a positive effect.
A reference to another product/person but with little effect.
How two or more products/people work together to create a negative effect.
One piece of media technology.
Another name for websites.
References to other types of media.
The joining of two distinct technologies in a media product.
